mapper.sql: SELECT f.id, f.verifier_id, u1.full_name as verifierName, f.certifier_id, u2.full_name as certifierName, f.name, f.type, f.apply_time, f.success_time, f.invoice, f.cost, f.card, f.proposer_id, u3.full_name as proposerName, f.state, f.task_id FROM t_funding f LEFT JOIN t_user u1 ON (f.verifier_id=u1.user_id) LEFT JOIN t_user u2 ON (f.certifier_id=u2.user_id) LEFT JOIN t_user u3 ON (f.proposer_id=u3.user_id) where 1=1

if.test: statrtTime!=null and statrtTime!='' and endTime!=null and endTime!=''

mapper.select:
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cost), 0) FROM t_funding where state=3
AND DATE_FORMAT(success_time,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{statrtTime} AND #{endTime}
AND cost > 0
AND cost < 0

select COUNT(*) from t_funding where 1=1
AND id=#{fundingId}
mapper.update: update t_funding set state=#{funding.state} where id=#{funding.id}

update t_funding set
name=#{funding.name},
apply_time=#{funding.applyTime},
proposer_id=#{funding.proposerId},
verifier_id=#{funding.verifierId}, certifier_id=#{funding.certifierId}, type=#{funding.type}, success_time=#{funding.successTime}, invoice=#{funding.invoice}, cost=#{funding.cost}, card=#{funding.card}, task_id=#{funding.taskId} where id=#{funding.id} and state!=3
mapper.insert: insert into t_funding( name, proposer_id, apply_time, state, type, success_time, invoice, cost, card, task_id )values ( #{funding.name}, #{funding.proposerId}, #{funding.applyTime}, 1, #{funding.type}, #{funding.successTime}, #{funding.invoice}, #{funding.cost}, #{funding.card}, #{funding.taskId} )
